title: Mark Milley
deleted: In May 2020, Milley and the Joint Chiefs of Staff released their vision and guidance for officer professional military education entitled [https://www.jcs.mil/Portals/36/Documents/Doctrine/education/jcs_pme_tm_vision.pdf?ver=2020-05-15-102429-817 Developing Today’s Joint Officers for Tomorrow’s Ways of War]: The Joint Chiefs of Staff Vision and Guidance for Professional Military Education & Talent Management. Their vision recognizes that complexity across the five battlefield domains will require officers to have a heightened level of intellectual prowess and focused on an outcomes-based approach to preparing officers to lead in an all-domain, joint environment. <ref>{{cite news | last=Oler | first=Adam | title=On the Path to Intellectual Overmatch| url=https://warontherocks.com/2020/06/on-the-path-to-intellectual-overmatch/ |date=June 2, 2020| website=warontherocks.com}}</ref> "Our collective aim is the development of strategically minded joint warfighters, who think critically and can creatively apply military power to inform national strategy, conduct globally integrated operations, and fight under conditions of
